item.Q:
Write the character:
holy; sacred; saint; sage
item.A:
圣 (strokes unavailable)
traditional: 聖
shèng
神圣 (神聖) shénshèng divine; hallow; holy; sacred

item.Q:
Write the character:
bad; spoiled; broken; to break down
item.A:
traditional: 壞
huài
破坏 (破壞) pòhuài wreck; break; destroy

item.Q:
Write the character:
at first; (at the) beginning; first; junior; basic
item.A:
chū
初期 chūqī initial stage; beginning period

item.Q:
Write the character:
tool; device; utensil; equipment; instrument; (classifier for devices, coffins, dead bodies)
item.A:
jù
具有 jùyǒu have; possess

item.Q:
Write the character:
to advance; in advance; beforehand; to prepare
item.A:
traditional: 預
yù
预备 (預備) yùbèi to prepare; to make ready; preparation; preparatory

item.Q:
Write the character:
(particle equivalent to 啊 after a vowel, expressing surprise or doubt)
item.A: ya

item.Q:
Write the character:
multitude; abbr. for 眾議院|众议院 House of Representatives
item.A:
traditional: 眾
zhòng
群众 (群眾) qúnzhòng the masses

item.Q:
Write the character:
duty; responsibility; to reproach; to blame
item.A:
traditional: 責
zé
负责 (負責) fùzé in charge of; to be responsible for (sth)

item.Q:
Write the character: shèng
(shénshèng de shèng)
item.A:
圣 (strokes unavailable)
traditional: 聖
holy; sacred; saint; sage
神圣 (神聖) shénshèng divine; hallow; holy; sacred

item.Q:
Write the character: huài
(pòhuài de huài)
item.A:
traditional: 壞
bad; spoiled; broken; to break down
破坏 (破壞) pòhuài wreck; break; destroy

item.Q:
Write the character: chū
(chūqī de chū)
item.A:
at first; (at the) beginning; first; junior; basic
初期 chūqī initial stage; beginning period

item.Q:
Write the character: jù
(jùyǒu de jù)
item.A:
tool; device; utensil; equipment; instrument; (classifier for devices, coffins, dead bodies)
具有 jùyǒu have; possess

item.Q:
Write the character: yù
(yùbèi de yù)
item.A:
traditional: 預
to advance; in advance; beforehand; to prepare
预备 (預備) yùbèi to prepare; to make ready; preparation; preparatory
(particle equivalent to 啊 after a vowel, expressing surprise or doubt)

item.Q:
Write the character: zhòng
(qúnzhòng de zhòng)
item.A:
traditional: 眾
multitude; abbr. for 眾議院|众议院 House of Representatives
群众 (群眾) qúnzhòng the masses

item.Q:

(fùzé de zé)
item.A:
traditional: 責
duty; responsibility; to reproach; to blame
负责 (負責) fùzé in charge of; to be responsible for (sth)

traditional: 神聖
shénshèng divine; hallow; holy; sacred

traditional: 聖人
shèngrén saint

traditional: 聖地
shèngdì Holy city; Holy land; sacred place; shrine

traditional: 聖經
shèngjīng Holy Bible

traditional: 壞人
huàirén an evil-doer; a malefactor

traditional: 壞死
huàisǐ necrosis

traditional: 壞處
huàichu harm; troubles

traditional: 壞話
huàihuà cuss

traditional: 好壞
hǎohuài good and bad; advantageous and disadvantageous

traditional: 打壞
dǎhuài bash

traditional: 破壞
pòhuài wreck; break; destroy
chūyī first day of lunar month; New Year's Day
chūzhōng junior high school
chūqī initial stage; beginning period
chūbù initial; preliminary; tentative
chūděng elementary (i.e. easy)

traditional: 初級
chūjí junior; primary
niánchū beginning of the year
zuìchū first; primary; initial

traditional: 當初
dāngchū at that time; originally
qǐchū originally; at first; at the outset
jǐamiànjù doughface

traditional: 具備
jùbèi possess; have; be equipped with; be able to fulfill (conditions or requirements)
jùyǒu have; possess

traditional: 具結
jùjié recognizance

traditional: 具體
jùtǐ concrete; definite; specific

traditional: 具體化
jùtīhuà avatar
jùtǐhuà concretize
qìjù implement; ware
jīajù furniture
gōngjù tool; instrument; utensil; means

traditional: 工具書
gōngjùshū a reference book (such as dictionary, almanac, gazetteer etc)
jiāojù realia
wénjù stationery; item of stationery (pen, pencil, eraser, pencil sharpener etc)
wánjù plaything; toy
yòngjù appliance; utensil
dàojù stage props
liángjù measuring device
miànjù mask

traditional: 天氣預報
tiānqìyùbào (n) weather forecast; weather report

traditional: 預備
yùbèi to prepare; to make ready; preparation; preparatory

traditional: 預先
yùxiān beforehand; prior

traditional: 預告
yùgào advance notice; herald

traditional: 預報
yùbào forecast

traditional: 預定
yùdìng schedule in advance

traditional: 預感

traditional: 預應力
yùyīnglì prestressed

traditional: 預料
yùliào anticipate

traditional: 預期
yùqī expect; expected

traditional: 預知
yùzhī anticipate; foresee

traditional: 預示
yùshì to indicate; to foretell; to forebode; to betoken

traditional: 預算
yùsuàn budget

traditional: 預約
yùyuē reservation; reserve

traditional: 預處理
yùchǔlǐ preconditioning

traditional: 預見
yùjiàn to foresee; to predict; to forecast; to envision; foresight; intuition; vision

traditional: 預言
yùyán prophecy

traditional: 預計
yùjì to forecast; predict; to estimate

traditional: 預賽
yùsài (n) preliminary competition; (v) hold a preliminary competition

traditional: 公眾
gōngzhòng public

traditional: 出眾
chūzhòng to stand out; outstanding

traditional: 大眾
dàzhòng people; public; masses

traditional: 大眾化
dàzhònghuà mass-oriented; to cater for the masses

traditional: 民眾
mínzhòng populace; masses; the people

traditional: 當眾
dāngzhòng in public; in front of everybody

traditional: 眾人
zhòngrén everyone

traditional: 眾多
zhòngduō numerous

traditional: 眾數
zhòngshù plural

traditional: 眾生
zhòngshēng all living things

traditional: 眾議院
zhòngyìyuàn House of Representatives (USA); Chamber of Deputies

traditional: 示眾
shìzhòng publicly expose

traditional: 聽眾
tīngzhòng audience; listeners

yǔzhòngbùtóng to stand out from the masses (成语 saw)

traditional: 觀眾
guānzhòng spectators, audience

traditional: 專責
zhuānzé specific responsibility

traditional: 指責
zhǐzé criticize; find fault with

traditional: 職責
zhízé duty, responsibility, or obligation

traditional: 責令
zélìng to instruct sb to finish something; to order; to enjoin; to charge

traditional: 責任
zérèn responsibility; blame; duty

traditional: 責任制
zérènzhì system of job responsibility

traditional: 責任心
zérènxīn sense of responsibility

traditional: 責任感

traditional: 責備
zébèi to blame; to criticize sb

traditional: 責怪
zéguài to blame; to rebuke

traditional: 責成
zéchéng give sb a task

traditional: 責難
zénàn censure
